content: **2025 crochet a block** > this pattern is available as a free > crochet along at the link provided crochet a throw or afghan consisting of 25 unique squares worked in a variety of motifs and stitches **difficulty level | skills required** easy to intermediate basic stitches in simple variations simple repeats color changes shaping and finishing you will need to know basic stitches like single_crochet single_crochet and double_crochet double_crochet special stitches explained and provided with each square **materials** hook 4 00 mm g scissors yarn needle **yarn ** vinnis colours dk nikkim 100% cotton 50 grams/119 meters weight dk 11 wpi 3 light approx 1300 grams / 3380 yards / 3094 meters 26 balls colors a - natural x 6 b - cappuccino x 6 c - princess aqua x 3 d princess lilac x 3 e - seychelles x 4 f purple mix x 4 for this project i used 6 colours this is not preset and you can use any colour combo of your choosing i have a sheet available to print to help with colour adjustments four colors are used per square i e a b c e or a b d f **note ** this is only a suggestion you can use any colour combination and any amount of colours **yarn substitute ** using the same type of yarn throughout the project is recommended the pattern suggests cotton dk yarn but you are not limited to this type of yarn any yarn can be used if you take into consideration your sizing for the project will differ **gauge | gauge** gauge is not necessary for this project to be perfect however counting your stitches will ensure a true success of this project blocking your squares are recommended not necessary for the consistency in size for the squares **size** square size - 9 inches / 23 cm final blanket size without border approx length and width = 45 inches / 115 cm with border approx length and width = 48 inches / 122 cm remember if you use/choose a different yarn weight/hook size your blanket will be a different size **abbreviations us terminology** **pattern support** full pattern support is available from the joanita theron designs facebook group or/and joanita theron designs ravelry group please post a question in the group and remember to tag me i will assist as soon as possible or one of my members will gladly jump in to help for questions relating to permission or usage email joanita@creativecrochetworkshop com ***pattern pdf versions are only available in english unless other languages are specified refunds will not be offered on digital products *** it is highly encouraged that you make a copy of your purchased digital downloads for your back-up purposes only
